home.heroDesc: Experience the true taste of Georgia with our handcrafted khinkali, made from traditional recipes passed down through generations.
home.about1: At Khinkalito, we bring you the authentic taste of Georgia through our handmade khinkali.
home.about2: Each dumpling is carefully crafted using traditional recipes passed down through generations, ensuring every bite delivers the genuine flavors of Georgian cuisine.
home.madeWithLoveDesc: Every khinkali is handcrafted with care and traditional techniques
home.freshIngredientsDesc: We use only the finest, freshest ingredients sourced daily
home.fastDeliveryDesc: Quick delivery across Tbilisi in 30-45 minutes
home.menuDesc: Choose from our selection of traditional Georgian dumplings, each prepared with authentic recipes and premium ingredients
home.completeOrderDesc: Fill in your details and delivery address to receive your delicious khinkali
